title: Fix game please
body: Instead of bringing new champions and making a new map how about we fix the game? Fix all the bugs that have been around for 2 seasons and how about a nerf for warwick..........he is clearly broken or can you not see that? I didnt think it was hard that.....then again you seem to be useless and utterly lazy.

replies.body: He's only op in the new jungle, not many people complained about him for like 2-4 seasons.
game is broken beyond repair your only hope is they some how fix it by breaking it more.
